page.title: 07 St.Crispin Hospital, Duston
page.content:
Staffing consists of 11 Consultants, 14 full time Junior Doctors and 12 part time Doctors. Each night from 5 - 9 p.m. there is one Consultant and three Junior Doctors on duty covering three wards and the Outpatients' Department. The 350 nurses are divided into three groups - two for day duty (8 hours) and one for nights (12 hours, three nights a week).
The staff have their own sporting and recreational facilities. In earlier days, the staff had to live on the wards with the patients.
